name: Jason Clark
text:
Awesome place! Great selection! and the guys there know firearms in and out. They're very knowledgeable and know their stuff! The atmosphere there is very chill also. They didn't try to push me into buying something that i didn't even want. They make their suggestion when you tell them what you are looking for and they just kind of step back and let you make your own decision about it.

I appreciate that! I Can't stand to be pressured about buying something.
Top notch business and Top notch people there!
I'll be back👍

name: Rob Jordan
text: Today was my first time going in here, and the guys really helped me out I gave them what I wanted and price range and they made it happen. They are very knowledgeable guys and know everything it is when it comes to guns. The guys in there are easy to talk to and truly want to help you. Highly recommend.

name: Anthony Thomas
text:
Great shop, stopped in this week for the first time after my local shops all disappointed me with bad customer service.

Drove 40 minutes to get here. Staff was great, had a great selection, purchased me a new pistol chambered carbine for a great price.

resp.text: Thank you Anthony, We take pride in our customer service, and by the way we stand by our guns. We hope to have a big shipment of ammo next week. Safe shooting. Don

name: Alex Medlin
text: High prices and poor customer service

name: Mr. K
text: Really enjoyed the salesman I worked with. I knew exactly what I wanted however he showed me a more recent model that I had no idea about. His recommendation was more ideal for the purpose of my purchas . Every concern I had, he showed me a viable solution.  Thanks for the professionalism and knowledge.

name: Bobby Kilgore
text: Great store!  Anything and everything you could ever want for shooting.  People are great and know what they are doing!  Highly recommend this store.  You won't be disappointed.

resp.text: We try to please. It's all about customer service.

name: Joshua Mitchell
text: Very knowledgeable and helpful guys. At first look it may seem they don't have as many guns as a place like Academy but they actually have way cooler and more quality stuff. Plus they actually know their guns. Tom helped me find a perfect concealed carry weapon as I wasn't very familiar with the different types of handguns. They have a lot of cool surplus gear too. They are a very experienced crew who can also make a new customer feel comfortable so I would recommend this shop to new shooters or professional ones the same.

name: Herman Daniel
text: They have almost anything that you can find online but you are standing there talking to a real person. They are awesome and the only thing that I am sorry for is the fact that I had not found them sooner. Found my go to  tactical shop. Glad I found yall!!

resp.text: Thanks for finding us. We try hard to give great customer service. Thank for your business.

name: agbond003
text:
Overall, my experience at Southern Survival Store has been absolutely positive.
The Products they carry are of great quality and prices are more then reasonable. The customer service is top notch and I always feel welcome to approach them. When I ask a question or ask for an opinion on certain items, the staff will answer in a fashion that illustrates both honesty and integrity. When you have an interest in a particular item, the staff will not give you a few sale's pitch lines; instead they will tell you their actuall experience with the product. Knowing that these guys really use what they sale brings confidence in my purchases. Long story short, this is the best example of an army surplus store in every category that can be graded.
I highly encourage anyone one with outdoors, survival, or defense needs to check this place out.

name: Brian Mccall
text:
I was greeted as soon as I walked in the door, really nice staff. I was under the impression I was walking into a oldschool millitary surplus somthing like heart of dixie was so i must say i left a little disapointed but i will be back for hunting ammo for m1
I notice it was almost half price of what i paid last time

resp.text: Brian, thanks for coming into our store. We used to have lots of surplus but as you saw we are selling out of that business. We now focus on Tactical Guns and Training. Thank you for your review. Don

name: Leon Stark
text: They don't treat you like an idiot for asking what something is or about firearms. That alone makes them better than most places I decided not to do business with. Very good selection of products.

name: Nguyen Huy
text: This place is amazing. The staffs are so friendly and they are ready to help you when need. Their price are reasonable and worth it.

name: Nicholas Molinari
text: Great trip out there. I spoke with the owner Don and he was very kind and honest. The prices are great and the store very organized.

name: Demetrios
text: This place is a build a gun Masterpiece.  Love this place.

name: Melanie Lankford
text: This store has top quality equipment, trainers and gun experts. The classes they offer are very impressive survival and preparedness skills in a realistic atmosphere for a variety of situations.

name: Sherry Kilgore
text: Great customer service before and after the sale!

name: Robert Bennett
text:
They make feel welcomed and ready to help.
Great selection to choose from.

name: Bart Rushing
text: Friendly and knowledgeable staff... Seems to be about everything you could need...

name: John M
text: Wide variety of survival supplies, firearms, & ammunition. Knowledgeable staff.

name: Roy Aaron
text: Best place for all outdoor gear hands down

name: Randy Norred
text: This place is amazing and they are very helpful.

name: michelle cloutier
text: Friendly staff kinda musty inside.

name: Jerred Hall
text: Get-R-done!!!!!!!!!

resp.text: Thank you Jerred, we are trying. Don

name: Jacob Pearce
text: I initially had a hard time getting correspondence from them after placing an order but once I did, they went above and beyond to address my concerns. I was impressed by the response from Ashley and definitely plan on using them again in the future.

resp.text: Hi Jacob, I apologize for the lack of correspondence regarding your web order. Please reach out to me directly at ashley@uspglobal.com and I will be more than happy to look into your order and get you an update. We appreciate your business and want to ensure your satisfaction!

name: CJ Russo
text: Kind of small and a bit pricey but it’s the only place in town to get most of the stuff you would need for deployment.

resp.text: Thank you for your review. We strive to offer the items that you need at an affordable price. We continually evaluate our inventory and pricing, so please be sure to check back with us. If you have any suggestions for additional product please let us know! Hope we can assist you in the future.

name: darrin sudberry
text: This place is closed down, don't waste your drive like I did

name: J.M. Wallnofer
text: A great surplus store in Mobile.   About an 80 minute drive from Pensacola.   It is located about 2 minutes away from a large farmers market that one could also go to if it’s the weekend. There is a lot of military apparel, some camping type goods, a few helmets, knives, pouches, boots, patches, and decals.  Prices are a little high, but not unbearable. Had a great conversation with a veteran who frequents the shop.  While there is little to any foreign surplus, it is a nice little shop to check out for what the name says, army and navy surplus.

name: Mike Hunt
text:
One of the few places you can find odds and ends like crates.

Crates and boxes are like crack. And you could say im fiending for them

name: Darryl Gulley
text: A lot of nice military apparel and accessories located in front of the skating rink. GPS throws you off course a little

name: Mike Guidry
text: Awesome place. Awesome gear. Super helpful owner of the business. Awesome experience

name: Steve Fetterman
text: Great place with good prices!!

name: Casey Roberts
text: Great quality items. Check out the jackets!

name: Milton Pritchett
text: He had  great stuff to buy and you can use

name: Milton Pritchett
text: It's having a little bit of everything what you look for if you don't see it he can't order it for you

name: Jaques Le Snek
text: This place is great for all your outdoor needs and great for collectors too I play a bit of airsoft locally and this is a great place to find durable gear I mean it is the real deal after all

name: Teddee Jordan
text: Nice selection. Helpful staff

name: Choose kindness
text: I've been to several Army Navy stores through the course of my life and I have never been in one quite like this. The gentleman sitting behind the counter on the phone I'm not even sure he knew that we were there as he never greeted us or asked if he could help. Almost anything I looked at had a price tag anywhere from $40 to well over a hundred now mind you this is all probably donated stuff or things that he bought from some poor veteran for pennies on the dollar and then put a thousand percent markup on. I will never be back and I find it describes full that anybody would buy a service man's gear a lot of it still with their name and rank on it and then Mark it up so high no wonder I was the only person shopping there and I did no shopping.

name: Charlotte B
text: Great little store with lots of good military/camping goods.

name: Eric C.
text: I've found several items are "pricy"; at times, some simple items are unavailable: "coil boot blouses", mess kit items, Marine Corps chevron's (I've been trying to build a plaque with the ranks I have achieved while serving), difficult to locate E-3 to E-5 Marine chevron NOT Army. I find it better to search on line for items. If you're looking for "camping" tools and equipment, or some cold weather gear (socks, gloves, inserts and balaclavas), you may find them here... Or not. Parking is limited, get in early.

name: Zachary Tomes
text:
Always been a good place to buy or at least get a feel for some surplus gear. He's usually got a lot of cool pieces for the collectors out there as well, but they naturally come and go.Some things are a bit pricey, but thats just how the market is, its more sensible for a brick&mortar store to stick to a set price then constantly fluctuate. Consider the few extra bucks you might spend as a donation towards keeping our neighborhood surplus store around :).

MREs can be hit or miss condition wise, but thats the nature of storing things down South. Also probably the only surplus store on the Gulf thats got a metric (you know) ton of GI sleeping systems, which is great if thats your speed.

name: J T
text: Got some Smith&Wesson handcuffs and a case for a really decent price. Awesome place with good stock. Would fully recommend whether you are a doomsday prep, an airsoft player, or a collector.

name: Thomas Bolinger
text: Awesome little surplus store with lots of good gear. I try to stop by here every time I'm in Mobile.

name: Prima Nocta
text: Excellent store for all your military needs.

name: Steven Buell
text: Called guy was nice and excellent customer service .

name: Alan Scull
text: A wonderful place to get anything for military person in your life

name: lynn bobik
text: Friendly,  knowledgeable owner.  Lots of surplus.  Reasonable prices.

name: Matthew Hayes
text: Not a very good selection and high prices will probably keep me from going back

name: Sean Tiblier
text: Nice pouches, there got a few, good prices. Would buy from again.

name: john hendrix
text: Very cool place with great prices.

name: Lisa Davison
text: Great customer service

name: Acy Wilson
text: Pricy.

name: Brian Phillips
text: they have a lot of stuff. All of it is more expensive than any other surplus stuff I have been to.

name: Foster Bettin
text: Good product selection, and good deals.

name: Austin Jerkins
text: A little overpriced but really nice people and selection.

name: Jackie Jolliffe
text: Lots of stuff but asking to much for it

name: Zack Taylor
text: He has some cool stuff, but some of it is a bit overpriced

name: Trevor Chase
text: Not responsive at all.  When I called originally and spoke with Laura Patterson she advised me she would assist me in designing a patch for my unit.  She was not responsive and dodged emails.  Later, when I called back and spoke with Jessica, I let her know what I needed and she made numerous excuses.  I won't be going to them again.  I went to this company after two other Army units had told me the process they had gone through to get their patches designed and told me that I'd need to reach out to a company to assist in designing a patch first.

resp.text: Mr. Chase - Please contact me at 800-458-5180 e. 121 to discuss this issue.

name: Brady Kriegel
text: Very good place. Got a lot of help from Jessica. She was very helpful, and my stuff got here fast.

resp.text: Thank you for the review and for shopping with The Supply Room, Inc.!

name: Vickie Birkes
text: Always best items. Approved by the Institute of Heraldry. Excellent Prices

resp.text: Ms. Birkes, Wow! Thank you for the great review and the 5-star rating. The Supply Room, Inc. strives to provide the best products at the lowest prices possible when it comes to Insignia. I see that your store offers collectibles. Although historical items, like the Flashes you have purchased, are produced to specification and approved by TIOH, I think that another great fit for your store would be some of our custom gift items featuring insignia. Check out our Military Pride section next time you visit our site: www.supplyroom.com/military-pride/army/. Let us know if you have any questions about our Pride items. Thank you again for your praise and for your patronage!

name: Brian Harmon
text: Best prices, best service, best quality.

resp.text: Sorry for the late reply! But thanks for shopping with us!
